source:
TEXT_BANARK122_04572_SEQ_00Maru seeks a hunter to brave the wilderness.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANARK122_04572_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

Maru aimerait que vous terrassiez quelques monstres.

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_TODO_00<tab>Keep lookout at the designated locations and slay any odqan that appear.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_TODO_00<tab>Observer les alentours aux endroits indiqués et vaincre les odqans étincelants

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the odqan fragments to Maru.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_TODO_01<tab>Donner les fragments d'odqan à Maru

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_000<tab>Next up's a bit of huntin'─a task I'm woefully unfit for. You're just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> we need, though.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_000<tab>Tu veux bien exterminer quelques monstres pour moi<var 1D /var>? Je te récompenserai comme il se doit, bien sûr.

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_001<tab>Your prey're creatures that make even the hardiest Radiant squirm in terror or...somethin'. I don't rightly know, but I wager the prospect of that kinda foe gets your juices flowin'.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_001<tab>Ils sont assez forts, seuls des soldats de l'Ost rayonnant pourraient s'en approcher... Mais je suis sûr qu'<var 08 E905 ((une combattante chevronnée)) ((un combattant chevronné)) /var> comme toi se chargera d'eux sans sourciller.

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_002<tab>Make your way, weapon in hand, to the Shroud of the Samgha, and be on the lookout for the odqan that stalk the area. Stalk them in turn, and collect two fragments of their hardened skin. ...That sound good? It does, don't it?
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_002<tab>J'ai besoin que tu abattes des odqans étincelants de la jungle des Sangha et que tu m'apportes deux de leurs fragments.

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_010<tab>Welcome back. You're lookin' fierce─I guess the fever of battle still hasn't left you. Hope you didn't slay more odqan than you needed...
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_010<tab>Tu m'as apporté des fragments d'odqan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_011<tab>Ah, you've really outdone yourself this time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. After I grind these up to a fine powder, I reckon the spirits we brew from 'em will have people talkin'─and drinkin'─long past hippo bedtime.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_011<tab>Merci, je savais que je pouvais compter sur toi<var 1D /var>! Pour tout te dire, leur jus fermenté est in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble à la préparation d'un alcool fort...

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_012<tab>They say an alchemist stumbled upon the recipe after a string of failures─he was tryin' to make an explosive liquid out of the powder, you see, but only got a liquidy liquid. At his wit's end, he decided to drown his sorrows with the tepid mixture.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_012<tab>Par le passé, un alchimiste se serait livré à la fabrication d'explosifs liquides, mais en vain. Brisé par son échec, il aurait lui-même ingurgité sa préparation.

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_013<tab>Imagine his surprise when the first drop hit his tongue, showin' that what the solution lacked in blastin' power, it made up for in flavor! Wasn't long before his libation spread to every corner of the island and he was hailed as a genius.
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_013<tab>Et elle s'est révélée délicieuse<var 1D /var>! C'est ainsi qu'elle aurait commencé à se vendre comme alcool populaire dans la région... Enfin, je ne sais pas si cette anecdote est vraie ou non.

source: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_014<tab>That's the story, anyroad. Believe it or not, the brew disappears almost as fast as we can make it, so I'm sure I'll be askin' for your help again sooner rather than later...
target: TEXT_BANARK122_04572_MARU_000_014<tab>En tout cas, il me faudra ré<var 16 /var>gu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment des ingrédients pour préparer ce breuvage. J'espère que tu m'apporteras ton aide.
